participant_1.background:
I started my own business.
I started playing recreational baseball more often and even took lessons to improve my skills.
i m looking forward to reading the latest political thriller.
I spend my days reading about politics and economics, and trying to understand how the world works.
I rode horses in the snow with my friends last winter.

participant_2.background:
My heart breaks when I think about the time my dog died.
I like to express my style through my fashion.
i work 2 jobs.
I'm not sure how to fit in with people my age because I didn't have much social interaction when I was younger.
I enjoy my summers and keep up with my family on weekends.

content.text: Hi! It was great! I spent time with my family and enjoyed my summer.
That sounds nice! I spent most of my time reading political thrillers and working on my business.
What kind of business did you start?
I started a book club where people can meet up and discuss books they've read.
Oh that sounds like a great idea! I love reading books.
Me too! What are some of your favorite books?
I really enjoyed the Harry Potter series and the Hunger Games series.
I've read both of those series! They were great!
I also really enjoy books about history.
Me too! I love learning about the past.
What are some of your favorite historical books?
I really enjoyed A People's History of the United States by Howard Zinn. It's a great book that tells the story of American history from the perspective of the people who lived it.
That sounds like a really interesting book! I'll have to check it out.
